sentences.sContent: There were many more deaths than was first supposed.
sentences.sCn: 死亡人数远远超过最初的预料。

sentences.sContent: (= it is unlikely that ) he’s lying.
sentences.sCn: 没有理由认为他在说谎。

synos.tran: 假设；认为；让（虚拟语气）；推想

remMethod.val: sup(在下面) + pos(放置) ＋ e → 私下将某种猜测放在心中 → 假想， 猜想

words.tran: 假定的；被信以为真的；想象上的

trans.tranCn: 假想， 假定， 猜想， 推测； [用于祈使句]假定， 让； [常用于被动语态]期望做， 认为应该做
trans.tranOther: to think that something is probably true, based on what you know
